page-guidelines.main: In this page you will be able to:
page-guidelines.guide-1: Insert your own statement as a request for fact-checking.
page-guidelines.guide-2: Review our methodology and code of ethics.
page-guidelines.guide-3: Check other third party fact checkers.

action.createArticle: Create an article for the statement

result.title: Statement Check Results
result.urls: List of URLs documenting the decision
